long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically syncs the tabs opened in Chrome, enabling you to view them in any other browser. For instance, you can continue viewing the webpages you didn't finish at the office on your phone's browser while on your way home, regardless of the browser you use.
